meaning: empty string at either edge of a word. Don't confuse it with `"^ $"` which marks the edge of a string.
example: `"\\bpost`" will match 'post-processual' and' post hole', but not 'imposter'

meaning: empty string provided it is not at an edge of a word
example: `"\\Bpost`" will match 'imposter' but not 'post-processual' and 'post hole'
